abstract: John Chukwudi Utaka (born 8 January 1982 in Enugu) is a Nigerian footballer who currently plays as a striker for Turkish side Sivasspor of the Süper Lig. He is the older brother of Peter Utaka, who plays for Beijing Guoan in China. Utaka has played at two World Cups and three Africa Cup of Nations for Nigeria since his debut in 2002.
